problemStatement: Traditional motor rehabilitation for neurological conditions such as stroke and Parkinsonâ€™s disease is often repetitive, lacks patient engagement, and does not provide objective, high-frequency data to measure recovery progress. Similarly, existing digital educational tools fail to deliver the intuitive, kinesthetic experience of physical whiteboards and are often inaccessible to users with physical disabilities.  Most current solutions either require specialized hardware (VR, Kinect), focus only on engagement without quantitative motor assessment, or use limited gesture-based interactions. There is a need for an accessible, webcam-based system that enables natural hand-gesture interaction while providing objective analysis of motor skills for therapeutic and educational use.
solution: We propose an AI-Powered Therapeutic and Educational Air Canvas, a dual-purpose virtual canvas controlled using real-time, markerless hand gestures captured through a standard webcam.  The system allows users to draw and interact in mid-air while a machine learning module analyzes hand movement kinematics to quantify smoothness, precision, and tremor. These metrics provide objective, data-driven feedback for therapists and clinicians.  In an educational context, the platform serves as an inclusive and engaging interactive tool that mimics the experience of a physical whiteboard. Additionally, the system integrates a generative AI co-creator that assists users by refining or completing sketches, supporting users with motor impairments and enabling human-AI collaboration.  The platform is designed to be low-cost, accessible, and deployable without any special hardware.
techStack: Computer Vision & Gesture Recognition  â€¢ OpenCV  â€¢ MediaPipe (hand landmark detection)  â€¢ Convolutional Neural Networks (CNN)  â€¢ HaGRID (Hand Gesture Recognition Image Dataset)  Machine Learning & Analysis  â€¢ Python  â€¢ NumPy, SciPy  â€¢ LSTM / Random Forest models  â€¢ Time-series analysis for motor kinematics (smoothness, precision, tremor)  User Interface  â€¢ Python-based Virtual Canvas  â€¢ Tkinter / PyQt (UI implementation)  AI Co-Creator  â€¢ Generative AI model for sketch refinement and completion  Backend & Visualization  â€¢ Flask / FastAPI  â€¢ Matplotlib / Plotly (dashboard for motor skill metrics)  Hardware  â€¢ Standard webcam (no external sensors)

problemStatement: Modern networks are increasingly targeted by unauthorized access attempts, brute-force attacks, and malware intrusions. Traditional security systems primarily focus on prevention but provide limited visibility into attacker behavior once an intrusion attempt begins. This lack of real-time insight makes it difficult for defenders to understand attack patterns, intentions, and techniques. There is a need for a secure cyber deception system that can safely lure attackers, monitor their actions in real time, and provide meaningful analysis without exposing real infrastructure.
solution: CyberSentry V2 is a cyber deception platform that deploys multiple SSH honeypots to safely attract and monitor attackers in real time. The system captures attacker activities such as login attempts and executed commands, processes them through a backend server, and displays live insights on a centralized dashboard. This approach improves threat visibility while protecting actual network infrastructure.
techStack: Honeypots: Cowrie (SSH-based deception honeypot) Backend: Node.js (Express.js) Frontend: React.js Containerization: Docker, Docker Compose Logging & Monitoring: Cowrie logs, real-time log processing Networking: TCP/IP, SSH

problemStatement: The problem lies in the lack of intuitive, voice-based systems that support local languages and work reliably in low-bandwidth environments. Many users are unable to navigate apps or websites due to complex interfaces and language constraints. As a result, essential information remains out of reach for a large portion of the population. There is a strong need for an AI-driven solution that enables natural voice interaction and delivers accurate, contextual responses without requiring advanced technical skills.
solution: Gram Vaani is an AI-powered voice assistant designed to provide easy access to essential services through natural language conversations. Users can interact using their local language to receive information related to government schemes, healthcare, education, and daily utilities. The system uses speech recognition, natural language processing, and text-to-speech to deliver accurate responses. It is optimized for low-bandwidth usage and aims to be scalable, affordable, and accessible, ensuring inclusivity for underserved communities.
techStack: React.js,python FastAPI

problemStatement: Recent advances in generative AI have enabled the creation of highly realistic fake videos and audio that can convincingly impersonate real people. Scammers increasingly exploit this technology to commit fraud by posing as family members, company representatives, or authorities to manipulate victims into transferring money or disclosing sensitive information. Elderly users are particularly vulnerable because they: Trust visual and voice cues more strongly Are less familiar with AI-generated content.Often lack tools to verify the authenticity of digital media
solution: The proposed solution is a web-based application that allows users to upload video or audio files and receive a real-time assessment of whether the content is likely AI-generated and potentially part of a scam. The system uses pre trained deepfake and audio spoofing detection models to analyze the media, combines their outputs into a single risk score, and presents the result in a simple and understandable format.
techStack: Gemini Nano

problemStatement: Deepfake Detection  With the rapid advancement of artificial intelligence, deepfake technology has enabled the creation of highly realistic but manipulated images, videos, and audio content. Such content is increasingly used to spread misinformation, commit fraud, manipulate public opinion, and harm individualsâ€™ reputations.  The objective of this problem is to design and develop an AI-based deepfake detection system that can analyze digital media and accurately determine whether the content is genuine or synthetically manipulated. The solution should provide a clear real-or-fake classification along with a confidence score and be scalable, efficient, and adaptable to emerging deepfake generation techniques. This system aims to enhance digital trust, improve content authenticity verification, and support safer online platforms.
solution: It is a web-based, campus-focused platform that connects students with verified, short-term micro-opportunities based on their skills and availability. Students create skill-based profiles, while organizations post small tasks. A basic skill-matching mechanism connects suitable students to relevant tasks, enabling practical exposure for students and efficient, affordable support for organizations.

problemStatement: Predicting Accidents Before They Happen Road accidents remain one of the leading causes of injury and death worldwide. While modern safety systems focus on detecting accidents or reacting in real time, the majority of accidents are actually preceded by days or weeks of ignored near-misses, risky driving patterns, fatigue, and behavioral degradation. Current driver-assistance systems: React only at the moment of danger Depend heavily on expensive vehicle hardware Fail to identify long-term behavioral risk trends As a result, drivers receive warnings too late, after unsafe habits have already formed. There is a critical gap for an intelligent, software-first system that can: Analyze driving behavior over time Identify subtle near-miss patterns and risk escalation Warn drivers before an accident becomes inevitable The challenge is to design a system that works without specialized hardware, is scalable, and can evolve from mobile-based deployment to full vehicle integration. ðŸŽ¯ Objective Build an AI-powered accident prevention system that: Learns from driving behavior trends rather than crash events Predicts rising accident risk days in advance Provides proactive, preventive warnings to drivers This system should demonstrate how behavioral intelligence can shift road safety from reaction to prevention. ðŸŒ Impact A successful solution could: Reduce accidents caused by fatigue, distraction, and stress Enable early intervention instead of emergency response Create a scalable safety layer deployable on phones, vehicles, and fleets.
solution: AI-Driven Accident Prevention System We propose a software-first AI system that prevents road accidents by predicting rising accident risk days before a crash occurs, instead of reacting at the moment of danger. The core idea is to treat accidents not as sudden events, but as the final outcome of repeated near-miss behaviors such as late braking, aggressive acceleration, micro-swerving, and fatigue-driven inconsistency. ðŸ§  How the Solution Works 1ï¸âƒ£ Behavioral Data Ingestion The system ingests driving behavior data such as: Braking intensity Acceleration and jerk patterns Swerving and sharp turns Frequency of risky maneuvers over time For the hackathon demo, this data is simulated or replayed, representing realistic driving sessions over multiple days. 2ï¸âƒ£ Feature Extraction & Trend Analysis Raw motion data is converted into behavioral risk features, including: Sudden braking spikes Reaction delay indicators Driving smoothness variance Near-miss frequency trends Instead of evaluating isolated events, the system analyzes behavioral drift over time. 3ï¸âƒ£ Risk Intelligence Engine (ML Layer) An anomaly-detection and trend-based ML model learns: What â€œnormal driving behaviorâ€ looks like How risk patterns escalate gradually When the driverâ€™s behavior deviates toward danger The model outputs a Driver Risk Score (0â€“100) that evolves across days, not seconds. 4ï¸âƒ£ Preventive Warning System When the system detects a consistent upward risk trend, it triggers a pre-accident warning, such as: â€œBraking reaction time has worsened by 30% over the last 4 daysâ€ â€œNear-miss frequency increasing on evening routesâ€ These alerts are preventive, not reactive â€” issued before any accident occurs.
techStack: Data:CSV/JSON,Ml:Isolation Forest / Logistic Regression,Backend:Python,UI:Streamlit,Demo:Pre-recorded playback

problemStatement: During natural and man-made disasters, the absence of real-time route intelligence and adaptive logistics planning leads to critical delays in delivering relief supplies to remote and vulnerable communities. Damaged roads, limited vehicle access, and poor connectivity make coordination inefficient, resulting in preventable loss of lives, wastage of resources, and uneven distribution of aid.
solution: This project is based on the idea of creating a simple and user-friendly platform that helps people discover and learn skills needed for freelancing. The platform allows users to search for popular freelancing skills such as web development, design, content writing, and digital marketing, and understand what each skill involves.  For every skill, users are provided with clear learning paths, useful resources, and practical project ideas that reflect real freelance work. The system also gives insights into current market trends, helping users focus on skills that are valuable and relevant.  The main goal of this project is to make the journey from learning a skill to applying it in freelancing much smoother. It helps beginners gain clarity, confidence, and direction. This project is especially useful for students and freshers and showcases an understanding of real-world career challenges, making it a strong addition to a professional profile or job application.

problemStatement: 1. Farmers often rely on traditional practices and fragmented information, leading to low productivity and uncertain income. 2. Crop selection, disease identification, and weather planning are largely based on guesswork rather than data. 3. Crop diseases and climate changes are usually detected too late, causing major yield losses. 4. Farmers lack reliable tools to estimate profitability before cultivation begins. 5. Access to timely expert guidance and consolidated agricultural knowledge remains limited.
solution: An AI-powered smart agriculture platform that supports farmers throughout the entire farming lifecycle. Provides data-driven insights for crop planning, weather adaptation, and early risk identification. Enables early detection of crop health issues to minimize losses and improve yield quality. Offers profit estimation and market-aware guidance to support better financial planning. Empowers farmers to shift from intuition-based farming to proactive, sustainable, and profitable agriculture.
techStack: Next.js with TypeScript, Tailwind CSS

problemStatement: Managing pregnancy is a complex physiological process, but the rising prevalence of Gestational Diabetes Mellitus (GDM) and Pre-gestational Diabetes poses a significant threat to maternal and fetal health. Current healthcare systems often struggle with delayed diagnosis, inconsistent glucose monitoring, and a lack of personalized intervention, leading to preventable complications.
solution: The Core Solution We have built a Quantum-Enhanced Hybrid Intelligence System that transforms gestational diabetes care from reactive (treating spikes) to proactive (preventing them). 1. Data Acquisition (The Inputs) Continuous Monitoring: Real-time glucose data from CGM sensors and physical activity from wearables. Biometric Sync: Automated data flow via Bluetooth Low Energy (BLE) to a dedicated mobile app. 2. The Intelligence Engine (The Processing) We use a "Hybrid" model to get the best of both worlds: Classical AI (XGBoost/LSTM): Handles the day-to-day data processing and predicts immediate glucose trends. Quantum ML (QSVM/VQC): Uses Quantum Kernels and Entanglement to analyze complex metabolic patterns. It identifies high-risk GDM complications (like macrosomia) that classical computers are statistically blind to. 3. Intervention & Security (The Outputs) Virtual Health Coach: An AI-driven app provides instant, trimester-specific feedback on nutrition and insulin dosing. Clinician Dashboard: Alerts doctors to high-risk patients using risk-stratification. Quantum-Safe Privacy: Secured with Post-Quantum Cryptography to ensure maternal and fetal health data remains private forever. 4. Key Results Precision: 3â€“5% higher accuracy in risk detection compared to standard AI. Prevention: Early warning systems that alert mothers 30â€“60 minutes before dangerous glucose events occur. Outcome: Reduced rates of preeclampsia, C-sections, and neonatal complications.
techStack: Python, quantum technology, frontend (HTML,CSS,JS)

problemStatement: AI-Powered Mental Wellness and Community Support Platform.
solution: We are building EcoGuard (a phase of EcoSphere AI), an AI-powered industrial environmental intelligence and decision-support system. Unlike raw data sensors, EcoGuard uses Google Gemini to translate complex environmental research into actionable intelligence for plant managers and sustainability officers. The platform identifies likely chemical pollutants based on industry type (e.g., Textile, Pharma), maps their environmental pathways through air, water, and soil, and provides practical, low-cost mitigation and waste-management strategies .
techStack: React,nodejs

problemStatement: This platform is an inter-college student community and engagement system that prioritizes productivity, clarity, and belonging over screen addiction, functioning as a verified, student-only digital campus commons rather than a social media application. It centralizes and structures campus life by providing official spaces for clubs, committees, and student councils, offering central announcements for events and fests, and hosting academic forums that allow for anonymous doubt-clearing to support introverted students. The system includes "The Vault" for peer-to-peer academic resources, a verified Lost & Found, and utility-driven tools like Study Buddy and Teammate Finders that use topic-first matching to reduce social anxiety. Governance follows a student-led, faculty-backed model where the Student Council handles day-to-day moderation and discipline while faculty provide minimal oversight and final authority for conflict resolution. Built on a mandatory Google-first technical stack including Flutter and Firebase, the platform remains free for core access with an ethical, low-cost premium tier for advanced utility, strictly prohibiting ads, data selling, and engagement-addictive metrics like likes or followers to ensure a low-noise, high-trust digital extension of offline college life.
techStack: Firebase, Flutter, Gemini API

problemStatement: Students often follow a one-size-fits-all learning approach that does not address individual strengths, weaknesses, or career goals. Many students are uncertain about what to learn, how to improve, and which skills are truly required for specific industry roles, leading to poor learning outcomes and low job readiness.
solution: We propose an AI-based personalized learning platform that analyzes a studentâ€™s academic performance, interests, and learning pace to identify skill gaps aligned with their desired career path. The system recommends customized learning paths, relevant resources, and practice tasks, and continuously adapts suggestions based on progress. This enables students to learn efficiently and build industry-ready skills.
techStack: Frontend: React / Next.js for web UI, Flutter or React Native for mobile; Backend: Node.js (Express/NestJS) with REST APIs, PostgreSQL/MongoDB, Firebase, storage, and payments Stripe).

problemStatement: As essential services such as online registrations, payments, and applications move to digital platforms, system success is often measured only by completed transactions. However, a major issue remains unnoticed: users who start a digital task but silently fail to complete it.  Existing support systems like chatbots are reactive and depend on users actively seeking help. In reality, many users abandon processes due to confusion, repeated errors, language barriers, or complex workflowsâ€”without reporting the issue. These silent failures remain invisible, leading to poor user experience, digital exclusion, and incorrect system performance metrics.  There is currently no proactive mechanism to detect user struggle during the interaction itself and identify where and why digital systems fail their users.
solution: We propose an AI-assisted User Failure Detection System that proactively identifies silent user struggle by analyzing anonymized interaction patterns such as idle time, repeated corrections, navigation loops, and error retries.  The system detects potential failure points in real time, classifies the cause of user difficulty, and provides actionable insights to improve accessibility, usability, and system reliability. This shifts digital platforms from reactive support to proactive system accountability, ensuring that success is measured not only by completion, but by the systemâ€™s ability to support all users effectively.
techStack: React, Next.js, Node.js, Express, AI (LLM), JSON

problemStatement: Existing civic grievance systems are inefficient, lack transparency, and result in delayed issue resolution. This project aims to develop a software-based platform that enables citizens to report civic issues, track their status in real time, and helps authorities manage and resolve complaints efficiently.
solution: The proposed solution is a software-based crowdsourced civic issue reporting and resolution platform that enables citizens to report public issues such as road damage, water leakage, sanitation problems, and other urban concerns through a mobile or web interface. Users can submit complaints using images, live camera capture, geolocation, voice, and text descriptions.  Reported issues are automatically routed to the appropriate government department and authority level (ward, zone, or city) using location-based mapping. Authorities access a real-time dashboard with complaint details, geotagged evidence, severity indicators, and status tracking. A multi-level escalation mechanism ensures unresolved issues are automatically forwarded to higher officials, improving accountability, transparency, and response time in civic governance.
techStack: Frontend:  HTML, CSS, JavaScript , Leaflet.js for interactive maps and geolocation visualization  Backend:  Python ,FastAPI for building RESTful APIs   Pydantic for data validation , Uvicorn / Gunicorn as the API server  Database & Data Handling:  Structured data storage using Python data structures (Lists, Dictionaries, Sets, Tuples)  â€¢ Geolocation-based issue mapping  Additional Features:  â€¢ Image and voice-based complaint submission  â€¢ Role-based access for authorities  â€¢ Real-time status updates and escalation alerts

problemStatement: In todayâ€™s rapidly evolving job market, students acquire multiple technical skills through college courses and online platforms, but they struggle to understand how these skills align with real industry roles. Most students are unaware of which roles they are suitable for, what specific skills they are missing, and how to plan their learning journey effectively. Existing platforms focus either on teaching skills or listing job opportunities, but they fail to clearly translate a studentâ€™s current skill set into industry-relevant roles with actionable guidance. This gap leads to confusion, poor career decisions, and reduced confidence among students.
solution: We propose a Skill Gap Translator that bridges the gap between student skills and industry roles. The system takes a studentâ€™s current skills as input and compares them with predefined industry role requirements. It then identifies suitable roles, highlights missing skills for each role, and provides a clear learning roadmap. The solution is designed to be simple, explainable, and scalable, focusing on clarity rather than complex black-box models. This helps students make informed career decisions and plan their skill development effectively.
techStack: Python, Dictionary / JSON, Streamlit (optional UI)

problemStatement: Existing civic grievance systems are inefficient, lack transparency, and result in delayed issue resolution. This project aims to develop a software-based platform that enables citizens to report civic issues, track their status in real time, and helps authorities manage and resolve complaints efficiently.
solution: The proposed solution is a software-based crowdsourced civic issue reporting and resolution platform that enables citizens to report public issues such as road damage, water leakage, sanitation problems, and other urban concerns through a mobile or web interface. Users can submit complaints using images, live camera capture, geolocation, voice, and text descriptions.  Reported issues are automatically routed to the appropriate government department and authority level (ward, zone, or city) using location-based mapping. Authorities access a real-time dashboard with complaint details, geotagged evidence, severity indicators, and status tracking. A multi-level escalation mechanism ensures unresolved issues are automatically forwarded to higher officials, improving accountability, transparency, and response time in civic governance.

problemStatement: Problem Statement - MSME Compliance Automation Software  Micro, Small and Medium Enterprises (MSMEs) face significant challenges in managing statutory and regulatory compliances due to multiple Central and State laws, frequent policy changes, and fragmented compliance systems. Manual tracking and limited legal awareness often result in missed deadlines, penalties, and loss of government benefits. There is a need for a centralized, software-based compliance automation platform that can identify applicable compliances for MSMEs, track statutory deadlines, and provide timely alerts. The objective is to reduce compliance burden, improve regulatory adherence, and enhance Ease of Doing Business for MSMEs.
solution: Develop a centralized, cloud-based MSME Compliance Automation Platform accessible via web and mobile browsers.  Enable MSME onboarding and profiling to capture business type, sector, turnover, employee count, and state.  Automatically map applicable Central and State compliances based on business profile.  Generate a dynamic compliance calendar with monthly, quarterly, and annual statutory deadlines.  Provide automated alerts and reminders through email, SMS, or messaging platforms to prevent missed filings.  Offer a secure document management system for uploading, storing, and retrieving compliance records.  Include a dashboard and analytics module to show compliance status, pending actions, and risk indicators.  Support regulatory update notifications with simplified explanations of rule changes.  Ensure the platform is scalable, secure, and affordable, improving compliance adherence and Ease of Doing Business for MSMEs.
techStack: React.js,Node.js,PostgreSQL,Python(NLP),Firebase

problemStatement: Decline of natural pollinators (bees, butterflies) due to habitat loss, pesticide use, and climate change.   â€‹Threatens global food production as many crops rely on pollinators for reproduction.   â€‹Increasing crop demands highlight the need for efficient and consistent pollination methods.
solution: SmartBloom is an AI-powered robotic pollination system designed to address the decline of natural pollinators and the challenges of manual pollination in vertical and indoor farms. The system uses an ESP32/Camera or Raspberry Piâ€“based rover to autonomously detect flowers through computer vision and gently pollinate them using a servo-driven soft brush. Integrated sensors like AQI ensure healthy plant environments, while IoT connectivity enables monitoring and control. SmartBloom offers a low-cost, scalable, and eco-friendly alternative to traditional pollination methods, improving crop yield, reducing labor, and supporting sustainable agriculture. Itâ€™s built as a practical, deployable solution for modern farming.
techStack: ESP32-CAM - Detects flowers, stages, and positioning. ToF Sensors â€“ Provides depth perception and aids aisle navigation. Servo-Driven Brush â€“ Gently mimics natural bee pollination Motor Drivers â€“ Enable precise rover mobility and brush control. Software & Control â€“ HSV filtering for flower recognition, PID motor control, future ML integration. ml models : FOMO  for 2.0, and for 3.0 raspberry based YOLO v8 nano model

problemStatement: Late diagnosis of diseases such as diabetes, heart conditions, and respiratory disorders leads to preventable complications and deaths. Many individuals either ignore early symptoms or lack timely access to healthcare professionals. There is a critical need for an intelligent system that can analyze symptoms, lifestyle patterns, and medical history to identify potential health risks at an early stage and encourage preventive care.
solution: We propose an AI-powered early disease detection platform that allows users to input symptoms, lifestyle habits (diet, sleep, physical activity), and basic medical history. Using machine learning models, the system predicts the probability of potential diseases and categorizes the risk level (Low / Medium / High).  The solution provides:  â€¢ Early risk alerts  â€¢ Personalized health recommendations  â€¢ Guidance on when to consult a doctor  The platform focuses on preventive healthcare, accessibility, and data privacy, making it suitable for both urban and rural users.
techStack: Technology Stack  Core Language  Python 3   Numerical & Scientific Computing  NumPy  SciPy   Filtering & Estimation  Custom EKF implementation (from equations)   Machine Learning  scikit-learn (Linear Regression / Random Forest)   actual)

problemStatement: Creating program to control major civic issue in society. Which rise issue to the different individual commission. And issue solved by department
solution: Urban citizens frequently encounter civic issues such as damaged roads, garbage accumulation, water supply failures, and emergency situations related to health, fire, or law enforcement, but lack a unified digital platform to report and track these problems efficiently. The â€œReport and Developâ€ civic issue reporting system addresses this problem by providing a responsive web-based prototype that allows citizens to report both normal and emergency issues using text, images, videos, audio recordings, and location details. The system enables users to view nearby issues, filter them by category, upvote important problems, and track the status of their own reports as pending, in progress, or resolved. User profiles, theme and language preferences, and issue data are managed using browser localStorage, making the application fully functional without a backend server. Overall, this solution promotes transparency, faster response, and active citizen participation in improving urban infrastructure and public services.
techStack: Javascript, CSS,HTML

problemStatement: Current automated harvesters rely on cloud-based AI, which suffers from high latency, dependency on unstable rural internet, and expensive data costs, leading to slow and unreliable performance.
solution: EdgeAI enabled Real-time Fruit Harvester for Automated Smart Farms:  We are building an EdgeAI-enabled harvester that processes all AI inference locally on the device hardware. By eliminating the cloud, our system achieves real-time accuracy, functions 100% offline in remote areas, and significantly reduces operational costs for smart farms.
techStack: Node.js, HTML, Mobilenetv2, Yolo v11

problemStatement: Problem Statement In India, most college students and first-time earners have no formal credit history and limited financial guidance. Although students manage income from allowances, stipends, or part-time work, they often lack discipline in managing expenses and savings. As a result: Students overspend without tracking income vs expenses Develop poor financial habits at an early stage Fall into EMI / BNPL traps Get rejected when applying for their first loan due to lack of readiness Traditional financial systems evaluate credit history, not financial discipline, leaving students unprepared and excluded.
solution: Proposed Solution Student Finance Guardian is an AI-powered guidance platform designed specifically for students to: Analyze income and expense behavior Encourage disciplined financial habits Prepare students for future loan readiness The system evaluates financial behavior instead of credit history and generates a Student Financial Readiness Score, along with clear guidance to improve it.  How the Solution Works Student Inputs â†’ AI Analysis â†’ Readiness Score â†’ Actionable Guidance Key Features: Tracks income vs expenses patterns Identifies unhealthy spending habits Guides students on savings and expense control Builds discipline for responsible borrowing
techStack: Frontend: React.js + Tailwind CSS , Backend: Python + Flask (or FastAPI) ,AI/ML: Python, Pandas, NumPy, Scikit-learn, Data: Synthetic student financial dataset (CSV) ,Visualization: Chart.js / Recharts.

problemStatement: In campuses and public spaces, emergencies such as medical collapse, harassment, or accidents often occur in situations where the victim cannot make a phone call, speak loudly, or type a message. Existing emergency solutions fail because they: Depend on voice calls or long forms Require multiple steps during panic Are not usable in silent or threat scenarios Do not guarantee fast routing to the nearest responders As a result, critical response time is lost, turning preventable situations into serious incidents.
solution: Silent SOS is a one-tap emergency alert system that allows users to silently trigger help, automatically sharing their real-time location and emergency type with nearby responders and authorities â€” without calling or typing. The system is designed for panic-proof usage, where speed, simplicity, and reliability matter more than complexity. Silent SOS is designed to work in panic situations where speed and simplicity are critical. The user opens the application and triggers an emergency by tapping a single SOS buttonâ€”no login, no typing, and no phone call required. The system works even when the phone is in silent mode, ensuring that the alert can be sent discreetly in sensitive situations. Once activated, the system automatically captures the userâ€™s real-time GPS location without requiring any manual input. This eliminates confusion during emergencies and ensures accurate positioning. The user then selects the type of emergencyâ€”Medical, Safety/Harassment, or Accidentâ€”so responders can understand the situation and prepare appropriately before reaching the location. The alert is instantly transmitted to multiple endpoints, including campus security or a control room, nearby registered volunteers, and a centralized admin dashboard. This multi-channel routing ensures faster response and reduces dependency on a single authority. On the live admin dashboard, authorities can view the exact location on a map along with the emergency type, timestamp, and alert status (New, Acknowledged, or Resolved). This real-time visibility creates accountability, enables coordinated response, and significantly reduces emergency response time.
techStack: Tech Stack Frontend (User App) HTML, CSS, JavaScript / React Backend (Real-Time Data) Firebase / Supabase Location & Maps Geolocation API, Google Maps API Notifications & Alerts Firebase Cloud Messaging (FCM), SMS API (optional) Admin Dashboard Web Dashboard (HTML / React)

problemStatement: AI-Driven Pollution Source Identification, Forecasting & Policy Dashboard for Delhi-NCR
solution: BACKGROUND; Delhi-NCR pollution is episodic and seasonal, driven by multiple overlapping factors: crop stubble burning in Punjab/Haryana, traffic congestion, industrial activity, and meteorological conditions. Current forecasting tools lack source-level granularity, citizen-level accessibility, and real-time policy feedback.  DESCRIPTION; Developing a software platform (web + mobile) that provides: SOURCE IDENTIFICATIONâ€“ Use satellite data (e.g., NASA MODIS, ISRO), CPCB monitors, and IoT sensors(Optional/Dummy data) to trace pollution back to its source. FORECASTING: AI/ML-driven short-term (24â€“72 hrs) and seasonal predictions for AQI trends. CITIZEN APP: Hyperlocal AQI with personalized health alerts, safe-route suggestions (e.g., less polluted roads for jogging/commute). POLICY DASHBOARD ; -Data visualization tools for policymakers showing: - Source contribution breakdown (e.g., stubble burning vs. traffic). - Effectiveness of interventions (odd-even policy, ban on firecrackers, construction halts). - Recommendations generated by AI for targeted interventions.  SOLUTION: Providing transparent, data-driven insights for both citizens and policymakers. Helping enforce evidence-based interventions (e.g., focus on stubble burning vs. vehicular restrictions). Promote citizen engagement through personalized alerts and awareness. Mobile & Web App for citizens. Policy Dashboard with real-time analytics and AI forecasts.
techStack: React.js, Node.js, Express.js, Firebase (Authentication & Firestore), HTML, CSS, JavaScript, QR Code API

problemStatement: Most digital learning and productivity tools support students only after deadlines are missed or tasks are completed. However, students often struggle much earlierâ€”when they first open an assignment and do not know how to begin. They hesitate, stay idle, or keep switching between tabs, which leads to unfinished work and loss of productivity. Current systems fail to detect these early hesitation moments and provide timely guidance. There is a need for a system that can identify early signs of hesitation and support students at the right moment, before productivity is lost.
solution: We propose an AI-based system that detects early hesitation patterns when a student starts working on a task, such as inactivity, frequent tab switching, or lack of progress. The system identifies these moments in real time and provides simple, timely guidance to help the student take the next step. By offering support before deadlines are missed, the solution helps prevent productivity loss and improves task completion.
techStack: React.js for the frontend, Node.js and Python for backend processing, TensorFlow for hesitation pattern detection, and Google Cloud with Firebase for storage and deployment.

problemStatement: Current AI assistants are mostly reactive chatbots. They cannot handle complex, multi-step workflows or remember long-term context. Users still have to manually coordinate tasks between different apps. There is a lack of an intelligent assistant that can leverage multimodal context (text + images) to reason through problems and automate decision-making processes efficiently.
solution: We built AURA, an intelligent agent powered by Google Gemini 3 Pro. Unlike standard bots, AURA utilizes Gemini's massive context window to remember user history and its Function Calling capabilities to structure complex plans. AURA takes a user's vague goal (e.g., "Plan my travel"), breaks it into actionable steps using Gemini's reasoning, and executes the logic. It bridges the gap between a chatbot and a true digital executive assistant.
techStack: Frontend: Streamlit (Python-based, rapid deployment). Backend: Python (FastAPI/Flask). AI Engine: Google Gemini 3 Pro & Flash (for reasoning & vision). Orchestration: Google AI Studio (Function Calling). Memory: ChromaDB (Vector database for long-term recall).

problemStatement: A large number of students are unable to take written examinations in a fair and independent way because of physical or motor disabilities. This includes not only people who are visually impaired, but also those who cannot use their hands properly due to injury, neurological conditions, or long-term physical limitations. Today, such students are forced to depend on human scribes or assistants to write their answers. This creates serious problems: loss of privacy, risk of misinterpretation, delays, uneven quality of support, and in many cases, an unfair assessment of the studentâ€™s real knowledge.  Even beyond disability, traditional pen-and-paper exams are a rigid way of testing understanding. Many students are better at explaining ideas by speaking rather than writing long answers under pressure.
solution: We propose a secure, offline-first examination system that allows students to take exams using voice and simple physical controls instead of writing. It is designed for people who cannot write with their hands, visually impaired users, and anyone who prefers spoken responses. The student application can run on desktops, tablets, or mobile devices and is delivered in a containerized form with all required components included. Before the exam, it downloads questions and settings from the server, then switches into a locked exam mode and runs fully offline, allowing students to listen to questions, answer by speaking, repeat, navigate, and submit using buttons or voice commands.  All responses are recorded as audio and converted into text locally, with both stored securely on the device during the exam. Once the exam is finished and internet access is restored, the complete exam data is uploaded to the backend for evaluation. The system supports two user roles: students who take exams through the client app, and administrators who use a separate interface to create exams, review answers, listen to recordings, and assign or verify marks, each through their own secure APIs and data stores.  The backend runs on Google Cloud services to ensure reliability, scalability, and data security. Standard exam-proctoring and software security practices such as encrypted communication, activity logging, and controlled access are followed. By removing the need for human scribes and enabling offline, accessible, voice-based exams, the platform improves fairness, protects privacy, and simplifies exam management for institutions.
techStack: ( PERN STACK ) -> React & React Native â€“ frontend frameworks for web admin and cross-platform offline exam client ,  Node.js & Express.js â€“ backend for authentication, sessions, etc,  Google Cloud Run â€“ stateless server,  Cloud SQL â€“ relational database for users, admins, logins,etc, Cloud Storage â€“ object storage for non-SQL data , Google Speech-to-Text API, Text-to-Speech API,  Firebase Authentication â€“ secure login, Vertex AIâ€“ evaluates and compares answers ,  API Gateway â€“ secures and routes  APIs between  applications,  Cloud Logging and Docker â€“ containerizes applications for consistent deployment

problemStatement: Many college students enter B.Tech programs feeling clueless, confused, and overwhelmed due to the lack of structured guidance throughout their academic journey. Information related to placements, interview preparation, campus events, hackathons, internships, projects, and mentorship is scattered across multiple platforms such as WhatsApp groups, emails, notice boards, and social media. This fragmentation results in missed opportunities, poor decision-making, ineffective preparation for placements, and increased stress among students who already struggle to balance academics and career planning.
solution: UniSync is a unified, AI-powered platform designed to guide college students through their academic and career journey from day one. It centralizes campus activities like events, hackathons, internships, and peer collaboration, while also offering career-focused tools such as AI-powered mock interviews, structured placement roadmaps, project guidance, mentorship access, and resume evaluation. By bringing everything into a single, mode-based platform, UniSync reduces confusion, improves focus, and helps students make informed decisions at the right time.
techStack: Flutter, Nodejs, MongoDb, Firebase, websockets, express

problemStatement: Businesses advertise on multiple social media platforms. Customer messages and leads come from different apps, making it difficult for business owners to track, respond, and manage everything efficiently. This results in missed messages, lost leads, and poor customer engagement.
solution: A single unified platform that collects all customer messages and leads from different social media platforms into one dashboard. Business owners can view, respond, and track all interactions in one place, improving response time and customer conversion.
techStack: Frontend: React Backend: Node.js Database: MongoDB APIs: Meta Graph API, WhatsApp Cloud API Authentication: OAuth Hosting: Firebase

problemStatement: Students often struggle to plan and manage their studies effectively due to busy academic schedules, mental fatigue, and lack of consistency. Existing study planner applications require constant manual input, frequent typing, and complex interfaces, which discourages regular useâ€”especially during stressful exam periods. As a result, students waste valuable time planning instead of studying, fail to adapt their schedules when plans change, and gradually lose motivation. There is a need for a simple, natural, and time-efficient study planning system that reduces friction and helps students maintain consistent study habits without increasing cognitive load.
solution: The proposed solution is an AI Voice-Controlled Study Planner that allows students to create, update, and manage their study schedules using simple voice commands. Instead of manually typing tasks, students can speak naturally to add subjects, set study durations, reschedule tasks, and track daily progress. The system converts voice input into structured study plans, provides instant feedback, and adapts schedules when plans change. By offering a hands-free, conversational interface through a Command Line Interface (CLI), the solution minimizes effort, saves time, and encourages consistent study behavior. The focus is on simplicity, accessibility, and productivity, making study planning stress-free and intuitive.
techStack: Programming Language: Python Core Concepts: Functions, loops, conditional statements, file handling Libraries: speech_recognition â€“ for voice input pyttsx3 â€“ for text-to-speech feedback datetime â€“ for scheduling and tracking tasks os â€“ for file and system operations Platform: Command Line Interface (CLI)

problemStatement: AI-powered Mental Health Copilot  Mental health support is often inaccessible, expensive, and stigmatized. Many individuals hesitate to seek help or lack immediate access to trained professionals. Existing digital tools are either too generic or fail to provide personalized, real-time emotional support.
solution: AI-powered Mental Health Copilot is a 24/7 intelligent assistant that provides empathetic conversations, mood tracking, stress analysis, and early mental health support using AI and data-driven insights. It does not replace therapists, but acts as a first-line support system to guide users toward better mental well-being. 1ï¸âƒ£ Conversational Emotional Support AI chatbot trained to respond with empathetic, non-judgmental language Users can freely talk about stress, anxiety, loneliness, burnout, etc. Context-aware conversations using NLP and sentiment analysis 2ï¸âƒ£ Mood & Emotion Tracking Daily mood check-ins (happy, neutral, stressed, anxious, sad) Emotion detection from user text using sentiment analysis Visual mood trends over time (weekly/monthly insights) 3ï¸âƒ£ Stress & Anxiety Detection AI detects early warning signs such as: Negative thought patterns Sudden mood changes Prolonged stress indicators Generates personalized coping suggestions 4ï¸âƒ£ Personalized Coping Strategies Guided breathing exercises Short mindfulness sessions Positive affirmations Journaling prompts Sleep & focus tips 5ï¸âƒ£ Crisis Awareness & Support Detects high-risk messages (self-harm, extreme distress) Immediately provides: Emergency helpline numbers Encouragement to contact trusted people Safety-first AI behavior (ethical AI usage) 6ï¸âƒ£ Privacy & Data Security No public sharing of personal data End-to-end encrypted user chats Optional anonymous usage.

problemStatement: There are many diseases that are not diagnosed until after symptom onset, and many diseases were diagnosed many years after their inception; however, as a result of complex datasets containing enormous amounts of data, including biomarkers, diagnosis of rare diseases, and distress to the patient (specifically those who cannot communicate their needs due to injury or critically ill status), they will frequently go undetected.
solution: The healthcare system is generating vast amounts of medical-related information every day. Examples of generated data include the patient's vital sign level monitoring and interpretation (i.e., ECGs, EEGs, etc.), their movement patterns (e.g., gait analysis), the patient's facial expression (facial cues), clinician-supplied clinical notes from doctors, and the patient's long-term health record (i.e., the patient history database).  Currently, no system exists to scan the clinical record to identify emerging medical issues. Most diseases will present with very minimal biological change in the first stage of development, meaning they cannot be identified by a normal physician's examination alone. This is particularly true of rare diseases that can mimic the signs and symptoms of a common disease. Patients suffering from such misdiagnoses will have prolonged suffering due to repeated misdiagnoses and mismanagement of their health condition. This issue is compounded where the patient has no ability to verbally communicate their pain or distress, such as a patient located in an ICU, infant, elderly patient or a patient experiencing neurological impairment. Physicians will often need to rely on detecting delayed or incomplete signs of pain or distress after the patient's medical symptoms have worsened, or complications of illness and/or injury have materialized.  There is currently no existing system available to continuously build on a comprehensive long-term patient data set to find hidden signatures of potential diseases and correlate obscure combinations of signs and/or symptoms.
techStack: Technical solution outline Frontend (web or hybrid mobile)React.js with JavaScript/TypeScript. Tailwind CSS or Materialâ€‘UI for responsive UI.Chart.js / D3.js / Recharts for realâ€‘time stock charts, portfolio graphs, and leader board visualizations.   BackendNode.js + Express or Python (Django/Flask) for APIs, trading logic, AI integration, and fraud detection pipelines. Databases: MongoDB for flexible user/trade/fraud logs, PostgreSQL/MySQL for relational financial data. REST or Graph QL APIs for communication between frontend, backend, and AI services.   AI + data layer Neural networks and data mining for predicting stock trends, personalizing investment recommendations, anomaly detection for fraud. NLP model for chatbot (Python with TensorFlow/spa Cy etc.).   Security and blockchain integration Endâ€‘toâ€‘end encryption, tokenization, 2FA, and KYC/AML checks. Blockchain for Bitcoin transfers and audit trails; smart contracts for large transactions. Contextâ€‘aware anomaly detection and incident response workflows.

This makes it difficult to understand user needs and improve content quality. Hence, an interactive blog platform integrated with polls, feedback, comments, and an AI chatbot is required to enhance user participation and decision-making.
solution: So The proposed solution is an interactive blog platform that integrates blogs, polls, feedback, suggestions, comments, and an AI chatbot. It enables active user participation, real-time interaction, and continuous improvement through user-driven insights.

problemStatement: Organizations face rapidly evolving cyber attacks but lack real-time visibility to understand global threat activity and assess how potential attacks could impact their systems, leading to weak preparedness and increased security risk.
solution: DarkTrace Lite is a web-based cyber intelligence platform that visualizes real-time global cyber threats, simulates attack scenarios, analyzes impact, and provides actionable risk insights and defense recommendations to help organizations stay proactive and secure.
techStack: React/Next.js, Tailwind CSS, Node.js/Express, MongoDB/PostgreSQL, Python (Flask) for analytics, deployed on Vercel & Render/MongoDB Atlas.

problemStatement: AI conversations are limited by session caps and usage limits, especially on free tiers, often cutting users off mid-work and causing loss of context. Switching between AI models makes this worse, as each model operates in isolation with no shared memory. There is no reliable way to compress and transfer an entire conversationâ€”while preserving reasoning and progressâ€”into another AI within prompt limits. This breaks continuity and reduces AIâ€™s effectiveness as a long-term thinking partner.
solution: AI Context Compressor: Seamless cross-AI continuity tool. Paste any chat history; intelligently extracts goals, decisions, code, preferences, and unresolved issues. Delivers structured, high-fidelity compressed prompt (80%+ reduction) tailored for target models (Claude, GPT, Gemini). Enables instant, flawless project resumptionâ€”zero context loss.

problemStatement: Smart  Parking Management System Finding a parking spot wastes time and creates traffic. How can we let people see which spaces are free right now and guide them there?
solution: SHEM is an IoT-based energy monitoring system that provides real-time visibility into household electricity consumption. It measures voltage and current to calculate power and energy usage, delivering live data, usage trends, and alerts through digital dashboards. With basic load control and AI-ready architecture, SHEM empowers users to optimize energy use, reduce costs, and adopt sustainable habits.

problemStatement: Mental health issues are often under-addressed, especially among teenagers and young adults. A platform providing real-time, anonymous support can make a difference.
solution: Develop an app that provides mental health resources, offers a safe space for users to track their moods, and uses AI to suggest helpful articles or connect users with mental health professionals for anonymous consultations
techStack: AI/ML: For sentiment analysis and mood tracking suggestions Mobile App: To provide a user-friendly platform for self-care and consultations Natural Language Processing: To analyze usersâ€™ text and detect mental health trends Backend: Flask/Django for Python, or Node.js Frontend: React Native (cross-platform mobile app) Database: Firebase or MongoDB

problemStatement: Farmers often face difficulties in selecting suitable crops due to lack of accurate information about soil nutrients, soil health, and local climatic conditions. Many small and marginal farmers do not have access to soil testing facilities and rely on traditional knowledge, which may not always result in optimal crop yield. Additionally, farmers frequently encounter crop diseases and pests but lack timely expert guidance to identify these problems and apply appropriate treatments. Another major challenge is the communication gap between farmers and agricultural experts, especially for farmers who are not literate or are comfortable only in their local language. Existing agricultural platforms are mostly text-based, limited in regional language support, and do not provide real-time, personalized assistance. Therefore, there is a need for an intelligent, user-friendly system that can recommend suitable crops based on soil nutrients and district-wise environmental data, assist farmers in identifying crop diseases using images, and provide solutions through a conversational interface in local languages using both text and voice.
solution: Proposed Solution This project aims to develop an AI-based Crop Recommendation and Farmer Assistance System that: Recommends suitable crops based on soil nutrient content or district-wise data for farmers who are unaware of their soil composition. Predicts possible crop diseases from uploaded crop images and suggests appropriate preventive and corrective measures. Provides a multilingual AI chatbot that answers farmer queries in local languages using both text and audio. Helps farmers make informed decisions, reduce crop loss, and improve agricultural productivity.

problemStatement: Content creators and entrepreneurs struggle to grow their social media presence because they face three practical barriers: (1) limited time-they're juggling business operations, client work, and education alongside content creation; (2) lack of expertise they don't know how to develop a content strategy or optimize for different platforms; and (3) tight budgets-they can't afford professional tools, designers, or marketing support. Without these resources, consistent, high-quality content becomes impossible. As a result, growth stalls unless creators have unlimited time or money to invest. This forces many to accept slow growth or give up entirely.
solution: Creator Toolkit(CK Al) is an Al-powered platform that gives entrepreneurs and content creators instant access to professional marketing expertise without paying for expensive agencies. It combines five core features: real-time strategy conversations tailored to your business, Al-powered content creation for social media, data insights showing what content performs best, smart scheduling recommendations for optimal posting times, and audience targeting advice across Instagram, TikTok, Linkedin, and other platforms. Beyond just scheduling, Creator Toolkit acts as a smart mentor by combining content planning, trend discovery, caption optimization, and collaboration matching into one simple interface. It solves three critical problems: creators stay consistent through intelligent planning, they understand why content works or fails through clear performance feedback. By combining strategic guidance with operational efficiency, Creator Toolkit helps early-stage creators grow sustainably and compete effectively without needing a full marketing team or feeling overwhelmed

problemStatement: Public company stock data and quarterly performance reports are presented in complex financial language, limiting accessibility for individuals without financial expertise. This reduces their ability to understand company performance and make informed investment decisions.

Modern businesses struggle to scale customer support and operational management due to heavy reliance on manual handling, rule-based chatbots, and static dashboards. These systems lack real-time intelligence and cannot autonomously act on customer queries, delivery updates, revenue trends, or product performance. As a result, businesses face delayed responses, poor visibility, slow issue detection, and increased operational overhead. There is a critical need for an autonomous system that can intelligently understand, decide, and act without human intervention.
solution: We developed a True Agentic AI System that functions as an autonomous business operator. The system uses NLP to understand customer intent, a decision engine to determine optimal actions, and an analytics layer to monitor deliveries, revenue, and product trends. The AI independently responds to customers, tracks deliveries, detects anomalies, and triggers alerts or outreach in real timeâ€”without requiring human prompts. This unified intelligence layer transforms reactive automation into proactive, autonomous operations.
techStack: Natural Language Processing (NLP) for intent and context understanding Agentic AI Decision Engine for autonomous planning and action execution Analytics Engine for trend analysis and anomaly detection Custom Backend Services for delivery, revenue, and product data Notification Module for real-time alerts and proactive communication Modular, API-based Architecture for scalability and easy integration

problemStatement: Quantum-Resistant Secure Digital Records for Low-Connectivity Rural Systems.
solution: As governments, institutions, and organizations increasingly digitize critical records such as identity, land ownership, health data, education certificates, and financial information, security and long-term trust become central challengesâ€”especially in environments with limited connectivity and evolving cyber threats.   We propose a Quantum-Resistant Secure Record Vault, a lightweight backend framework designed to protect sensitive digital records against present-day threats and future quantum attacks. The system uses post-quantum cryptography and an offline-first design, making it suitable for authorized, role-based deployment within government and institutional systems, while remaining scalable across departments and regions and cost-efficient to maintain.
techStack: Python, cryptography, pqcrypto, click/typer, Docker.

problemStatement: Problem Statement: On-Road Assistance Web Platform  Vehicle breakdowns such as tyre punctures, engine failures, fuel shortages, and battery issues often occur unexpectedly and in unfamiliar or unsafe locations. During such situations, drivers struggle to quickly find reliable, nearby assistance, leading to long waiting times, safety risks, and stress. Existing solutions are either fragmented, limited to premium users, require prior app installation, or do not provide real-time availability of service providers. There is a lack of a simple, universal, and fast web-based platform that can instantly connect users facing on-road emergencies with nearby verified mechanics or service providers. This gap highlights the need for an accessible digital solution that ensures timely assistance, location awareness, and reliability during critical on-road situations.
solution: The proposed system is a web-based On-Road Assistance Platform designed to provide quick and reliable roadside support to users facing vehicle breakdowns. The platform eliminates the need for prior mobile application installation and ensures accessibility through any internet-enabled device.  When a user encounters an on-road emergency such as a tyre puncture, engine failure, fuel shortage, or battery issue, the user can access the website and submit an assistance request. The system automatically captures the userâ€™s geographical location using location services and allows the user to specify the type of problem encountered.  Based on the collected information, the system processes the request and identifies the most suitable nearby service provider by analyzing factors such as distance, availability, and service capability. The selected service provider receives the request and can accept or decline it. Upon acceptance, the user is notified with the estimated arrival time and live status updates.  The platform also includes a verification and rating mechanism to ensure service reliability and user safety. All service interactions are logged for monitoring and future improvement. This solution provides a fast, transparent, and reliable digital approach to roadside assistance, reducing response time, enhancing safety, and improving the overall user experience during critical situations.
techStack: Frontend  HTML5 â€“ Used to design the basic structure of the web pages  CSS3 â€“ Used for styling and creating a responsive user interface  JavaScript â€“ Used to add interactivity and dynamic behavior to the website  React.js (optional) â€“ Used for component-based UI development and better performance  Backend  Node.js â€“ Used as the server-side runtime environment to handle client requests  Express.js â€“ Used to build RESTful APIs and manage backend logic (Alternatively, Python with Flask can be used)  Database  MongoDB â€“ Used to store user information, service provider details, assistance requests, and feedback (Alternatively, Firebase can be used for real-time data handling)  APIs & Services  Geolocation API â€“ Used to detect the userâ€™s current location  Google Maps API â€“ Used for map visualization, distance calculation, and route estimation  Notification API (SMS/Email) â€“ Used to send real-time updates and alerts to users  Development & Testing Tools  Git & GitHub â€“ Used for version control and team collaboration  Postman â€“ Used for testing and validating APIs  Visual Studio Code â€“ Used as the development environment
